# excerptr
This is an R interface to [excerpts](https://github.com/fvafrCU/excerpts).

## Introduction
Please read the [vignette](http://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/fvafrCU/excerptr/blob/master/inst/doc/excerptr_Introduction.html)
or, after installation, the help page:

```{r, results = "hide"}
options(pager = "/bin/cat")
help("excerptr-package", package = "cleanr")
```

## Installation
You can install cleanr from github with:
```{r, eval = FALSE}
if (! require("devtools")) install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("fvafrCU/excerptr")
